noun.description: Miscellaneous articles, especially the equipment needed for a particular activity.
examples: drills, saws, and other paraphernalia necessary for home improvements
drugs and drug paraphernalia that had been discovered on the premises

origin: Mid 17th century (denoting property owned by a married woman): from medieval Latin, based on Greek parapherna property apart from a dowry, from para distinct from + pherna (from phernē dower).
